dataSetInformation.sourceCitation: European Commission, Joint Research Centre, Institute for Environment and Sustainability (2009): International Reference Life Cycle Data System (ILCD) Data Network compliance system, draft.
dataSetInformation.sourceDescriptionOrComment: The referenced files comprise the draft of the compliance rules of the International Reference Life Cycle Data System (ILCD) Data Network. The ILCD Data Network compliance document provides the overview and refers to specific documents that define specific requirements in the five areas quality, method, nomenclature, review, and documentation of LCA data sets and provide additional explanations for users. Note that different data quality levels are differentiated in the document that are to be referenced explicitly in the data set, e.g. "ILCD Data Network compliance - High quality data", or "ILCD Data Network compliance - Entry level phase I", etc.
